column6:
Facilities
Facilities:A comfortable space in an area close enough to the bustle sounds too good to be true? But weve made it happen. And now you can call it home! Choose a furnished single or a twin room equipped with a bed and a wardrobe. Dont worry your mom will never know the mess you made while eating and those stained clothes, we have a washing machine to wash all your secrets. Also, theres no brokerage and just 1-month security deposit. Cozy up with the friends youll make here and catch your most-loved sitcom - its really the perfect place for perfect evenings!

column3: OYO LIFE CHN901 SIPCOT IT Park
column6:
NA
Facilities
Facilities: Located in a well-connected residential area in Ramalingapuram, this OYO LIFE house is perfect for those who want a homely environment. With modern amenities and spacious interiors, this house is ideal for those who prefer a millennial cozy space to live. The bedrooms have modern furnishings including a wardrobe and full-length mirror. Bedrooms also boast of comfortable beds and attached bathrooms with provision for hot water. You will have 24x7 access to a fully functional kitchen with basic utensils, a refrigerator, microwave, induction plate, and a water purifier. There is a common laundry area with fully automatic washing machines. Access to high-speed wifi will ensure your connectivity with the world at all times. Here, we also take care of weekly housekeeping. You can use modern furniture to relax and unwind while watching TV. The dining area is perfect for a dine out with your flatmates..
What's Nearby
1.8 Kms from Hindustan Institute of Science and Technology
5.6 Kms from Kovalam Beach
Easily approachable by Uber, Ola, Zomato and Swiggy There's more bus stop, grocery stores, multiple ATMs, a chemist, a salon, and a few eateries are all within 200 meters or at a walkable distance.
